findings.title: Incorrect Logic in unclaimedTeamFund()
findings.description: The `unclaimedTeamFund()` function has incorrect logic, always using the current emission rate without considering the possibility of elapsed time crossing multiple years.

findings.title: Improper Logic in Farm::_calcAccOruToAdd()
findings.description: The `_calcAccOruToAdd()` function in the `Farm` contract uses an incorrect scaling factor (`10**_lpDecimals`) instead of the intended `ORU_PRECISION`, which may cause inconsistency.

findings.title: Revisited Logic in ORUSale::sendCarryOveredORU()
findings.description: The privileged function sendCarryOveredORU allows the owner to drain ORU tokens before buyers can claim all purchased tokens, which can lead to an unfair advantage.

findings.title: Improved Logic to swap() in Arbitrager
findings.description: Implicit assumption of deployment address of `ousd` being numerically smaller than `usdc` may not hold true on other networks, affecting portability.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Orcus protocol, there are some privileged accounts (owners and operator) that play critical roles in governing and regulating system-wide operations. These privileged accounts need to be scrutinized.
